message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand your position. While $12,000 is lower than I hoped, I'm willing to be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This gives us both a good deal and allows the transaction to move forward. Let me know what you think.
